# turing-pi-bmc Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    turing-pi-bmc = {
      source  = "jlec.de/dev/turing-pi-bmc"
      version = ">0"
    }
  }
}

provider "turing-pi-bmc" {
  endpoint = "10.100.100.231"
}
```

### Required

- `endpoint` (String) Turing Pi BMC endpoint
